quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie
quotes.quote: Teamwork is the ability to work together toward a common vision. The ability to direct individual accomplishments toward organizational objectives. It is the fuel that allows common people to attain uncommon results.

quotes.author: Stephen Covey
quotes.quote: Trust is the glue of life. It’s the most essential ingredient in effective communication. It’s the foundational principle that holds all relationships.

quotes.author: Phil Jackson
quotes.quote: The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team.

quotes.author: Margaret J. Wheatley
quotes.quote: Communication is the first step to connecting, and connection is the key to collaboration.

quotes.author: John C. Maxwell
quotes.quote: Connecting is the ability to identify with people and relate to them in a way that increases your influence with them.

quotes.author: Patrick Lencioni
quotes.quote: The single biggest problem in communication is the illusion that it has taken place.

quotes.author: Warren Buffett
quotes.quote: The most important investment you can make is in yourself. Invest in relationships and communication skills.

quotes.author: Henry Ford
quotes.quote: Coming together is a beginning. Keeping together is progress. Working together is success.

quotes.author: Ken Blanchard
quotes.quote: None of us is as smart as all of us.

quotes.author: Helen Keller
quotes.quote: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
